plot: American theatrical manager (Menjou) discovers Henie preparing for the Olympics in Switzerland and brings her to Madison Square Garden.
title: One in a Million

plot_en: American theatrical manager (Menjou) discovers Henie preparing for the Olympics in Switzerland and brings her to Madison Square Garden.

cast.name: Borrah Minevitch and His Harmonica Rascals
